definition: to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against

sentences.english: The proceeds as generated from any rule-breaking trading shall be dealt with pursuant to the relevant regulations.
sentences.chinese: 在违规交易中所获利益，依照有关规定处理。

sentences.english: The question is how much intensity does the specific infraction carry.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题有多少的具体违规携带强度。

sentences.english: The officials said there were campaign violations.
sentences.chinese: 官员称，该党的竞选有违规行为。

sentences.english: The driver was ticketed for parking in front of a fire hydrant.
sentences.chinese: 消防栓前而接到交通违规罚单。

sentences.english: Land acquisition and demolition of illegal behavior, according to the law severely punished.
sentences.chinese: 对违法违规征地拆迁行为，依法依规严肃查处。

sentences.english: The 2 condemnatory strength that should increase pair of enterprises to violate compasses act.
sentences.chinese: 二要加大对企业违规行为的处罚力度。

sentences.english: One could even say it is marketing malpractice.
sentences.chinese: 人们甚至可以将它称为营销违规行为。

sentences.english: There are lots of b, Ikes parked. Illegally around here.
sentences.chinese: 这里有许多自行车违规停放。

sentences.english: In addition, students will be held personally responsible for confronting and reporting any violations that would come to your attention.
sentences.chinese: 此外，学生个人也有责任将所遇之违规事项举发出来。

sentences.english: A number of securities companies were closed or temporary closed for reorganizing because of irregular operations.
sentences.chinese: 部分证券公司因违规经营被撤销或停业整顿。

sentences.english: Other eyes regarded him furtively , for this was a violation of the rules.
sentences.chinese: 其他人都偷偷看着他，因为这种行为是违规的。

sentences.english: Two is illegal, lose the trust of the people.
sentences.chinese: 二是违法违规，失信于民。

sentences.english: He says a lack of security will increase the chances of voting irregularities.
sentences.chinese: 他说，缺乏安全会加大投票违规行为的机率。

sentences.english: Members should report any campaign violations to the Elections Committee.
sentences.chinese: 会员须向选举委员会报告竞选中的违规情况。

sentences.english: It then punishes violators of the rules and regulations.
sentences.chinese: 其次才是对违规的人施以相应的惩罚。

sentences.english: Non-compliant product in production or unshipped will be rejected.
sentences.chinese: 生产中的和尚未出货的违规产品将被拒收。

definition: to investigate and handle (a criminal case)
to be a suspect (in a crime)/to be suspected of
to strike a severe blow/to crack down/to take strong measures
to make use of one's position to gain profit for oneself or one's associates
lack of discipline/to break a rule/to violate discipline/to breach a principle
